title: [1.8.9-1.7.2][5zig PvP][最新/全版本汉化][兼容Forge模组]
author: 北美路人
txt_content:
本帖最后由 熄灭的火把 于 2018-5-22 06:01 编辑 





简洁现代  Clean & Modern.
我一直专注于为这次更新，创造一个非常简洁但不失现代的设计。其简单的GUI可以在最好方式显示了大量的游戏信息。
I have been focusing on creating a very clean and modern design for this modification. Its simple gui can display a lot of stats in an awesome way.

自由调节  Adjustable.
5zig已经达到极致可调度，自由改变或者切换关闭几乎所有数据显示的位置。
The 5zig Mod has been made extremely adjustable in nearly any way. Change the location of the stats that should be displayed and toggle nearly every feature in the mod.

创新概念  Innovative.
5zig已经实现成吨的完全独特的新功能和理念。请在功能选项上参阅：自定义服务器API，坐标剪贴板和更多功能。
There are tons of completely new features and ideas that have been implemented to make this mod unique. See: The Custom Server API, The Coordinates-Clipboard and many more features in the features tab.

简单安装 Simple Installation.
由于新的安装程序，安装客户端从未如此简单。只要打开下载JAR-文件还有Java并点击“安装”，就完成了。
Due to the new Installer, installing a mod has never been so simple. Simply Open the downloaded Jar-File with Java and hit "Install". That's it.

社交好友  Social.
添加新好友并与他们保持联系。客户端拥有一个简单的聊天界面，5zig允许您与您的朋友进行实时沟通。
Add Friends and be connected with them. Featuring a simple Chat GUI, The 5zig Mod allows you to communicate with your Friends in real time.

大家好，我是熄灭的火把，大家也可以叫我飞儿（谐音游戏ID：Fearr）。 
这次为大家带来的客户端可不一般，5zig可是非常实用的，作为国外竞技以及联赛作用的客户端。
里面内置的新特点非常多，想必大家看到这里已经知道了吧。
不想开QQ？在MC里可以实现实时聊天！创建属于自己的讨论组！
实时查看好友在玩的服务器，打声招呼，为啥不一起玩？
这个客户端好在哪？5zig不同于其他的客户端，大家也知道。
Forge端启动慢，会发生随机的崩溃，但5zig客户端启动比原版还快！

Hey guys, my name is "熄灭的火把", also known as Fearr.
Today I am bringing you a quite special mod, it is called 5zig. It's really useful, and also it is offical client for MCPVP.
5zig included many new features which everybody quite get them now.
So, enjoy it :)
成为赞助  Become A Donor.
赞助5zig的作者！
你想支持我和我的作品？
赞助可能是帮我的最佳途径！通过赞助，你资助我的Web服务器，像客户端里的聊天服务器，域，邮件服务器，还有好多好多呢！
Donate to the author of "The 5zig Mod"! Do you want to support me and my work? Then donating is probably the best way to help me! By donating you help me finance my web-server and everything really that is associated with my mod like the chat server, the domain, the mail-server and many, many more.

当然，如果你赞助的话，也有一些奖励给你。
如果你赞2.5欧元，你可以选取以下四种披风之一。
Of course, there is also a little reward for you if you donate. By donating 2.5?, you will be able to chose between one out of currently 4 default capes. This cape will be displayed for you, and of course for any other player that uses any version of the mod. You can also change the cape later on by visiting https://www.5zig.eu/login or by changing it ingame with the 5zig mod.

如果你捐5欧元，你将另外能够创建自己的自定义披风，您可以通过游戏内上传或在https://www.5zig.eu/login 网站上上传
If you donate 5?, you will additionally be able to create your own custom cape that you can upload ingame or via https://www.5zig.eu/login.

注：您所购买到的披风可以随时转让赠送给别人

我的自定义披风

下载地址（附带安装器/已打包的安装器/整个客户端)  Download Links.
百度网盘：
点我点我
↑版本1.7.9 - 1.8.7
如需要1.7.2 请看下面
如需要整个客户端 请看最底


安装条件：

*相应版本的原版
*相应版本的Forge安装包（不是已经安装的游戏版本）
*相应版本的Optifine安装包（不是已经安装的游戏版本）
首先，5zig可以自选定安装，你可以安装Forge和Optifine，但你需要额外的指定安装包
打开安装文件Jar，按下Install。首先安装器会让你选择是否安装模组，如果选“Yes”是的话，你需要Forge安装包。
然后接下来是否安装Optifine(高清修复)如果选“Yes”是的话，你需要Optifine安装包。


找不到相应的安装包？

没关系，我已经打包好了
1.7.2
1.7.10
1.8


啊！好麻烦，我不要自己弄

没关系，我已经把客户端打包好了。
不过你要记住需要改一下Java路径哟，还有就是.minecraft文件路径。
百度网盘


想要兼容forge支持模组？ 想要中文输入？想要100%中文汉化？？
点我下载
1.7.10 和 1.8
中文汉化  Chinese Translations.
5zig已100%汉化
版本1.7.10-1.8.8







意见反馈  Feedbacks.
如果你对5zig有任何建议或者意见的话，可以在本帖留言，私聊，私信我的youku频道都是可以的哟。
我正在建议作者添加中文输入Mod，感谢大家~

更新日志  Update Logs.


?Version 3.0.10 (18.07.2015)


* fixes some minor problems with the Auto-Updater.


Version 3.0.9 (17.07.2015)


* minor fixes for bergwerglabs.de


Version 3.0.8 (17.07.2015)


+ added Support for bergwerklabs.de
* fixes "New-Day" bug in Chat GUI
* minor bug fixes


Version 3.0.7 (20.06.2015)


* fixes GommeHD.net lobby
* fixes order of stats in API
* minor changes and bug fixes
Available for Minecraft 1.8.7


Version 3.0.6 (14.06.2015)


+ The 5zig Mod now updates completely automatically, while your installed mods will be kept!
* fixes playminity.com support
* fixes toggling screen while ingame
* fixes large texts
* improved the installer
Available for Minecraft 1.8.7


Version 3.0.5 (07.06.2015)


+ rendering potion effect icon next to name
+ implemented new Server API changes (see http://github.com/5zig/The-5zig-Mod-API-2.0 for more information)
+ added translators to credits
* fixes toggle screen key
* fixes colored multiline messages from The 5zig Mod
* new overlay message now overrides no longer first but last overlay when maximum count is reached
- removed MCPVP button from multiplayer GUI (R.I.P MCPVP)
Available for Minecraft 1.8.4 and 1.8.7


Version 3.0.4 (22.05.2015)


* fixes joining Server of friend when already connected to a server
* fixes OpenGL 2.0 warning in Main Menu being overlapped by buttons
* fixes GommeHD.net server support
Available for Minecraft 1.8.4 and Minecraft 1.8.5


Version 3.0.3 (14.05.2015)


* fixes issues due to invalid file encoding
* fixes mcctf.com


Version 3.0.2 (12.05.2015)


+ added a better File Selector for selecting Capes or Chat Backgrounds
* Many options reordered
* Fix Ti**a InTime
* Fix Spectator Mode coordinates and direction
* Many improvements and bug fixes


Version 3.0 - The most awesome update ever! (08.05.2015)


- Friends!
        o Introducing a new Friend-System to the 5zig Mod.
        o Add unlimited friends, chat with them and have even more fun playing Minecraft.
        o All Friends can be viewed in a List.
        o Each Friend has an own Profile-Page, where you can see his current Profile Message, if he is online, his server he is playing on, the last online time of him and his avatar skin. (player heads powered by cravatar.eu)
        o Select Friends as favorites to let them appear at the very top of your friends List. They will also have a shiny yellow star next to them so that you can find them even faster.
        o Ultra-fast sending of messages via Java NIO
        o Very little traffic while chatting.
        o Send messages to your Friends, even if he is not online! Your Friend will then receive the messages as soon as he goes online.
        o Set a Notification Behavior individually for each conversation you have. 
        o Message Statuses! See, if your message has been sent to the server, delivered or even read by your Friend
        o The time of the Message is shown directly next to it
        o The date of the Messages is shown in the center of the Chat-GUI
        o Chats are saved offline, meaning that you can always have access to them, even if you are not connected.
        o You can change the background of the Chat GUI, or even make it transparent.
        o Get a Tray Notification when receiving new messages while the Minecraft window is not focused
        o Enable Message-Sounds to hear a sound when you receive any new message
                ? You can also change these sounds! Simply create a resource pack, containing an assets/the5zigmod/sounds/chat/ folder and both message_receive.ogg and message_send.ogg sound files. Alternatively, you can also change the message sounds located in .minecraft/libraries/eu/the5zig/The5zigMod/1.8.4_3.0/The5zigMod-1.8.4_3.0.jar/assets/the5zigmod/sounds/chat/
        o See if your Friend is currently typing!
        o Very customizable privacy settings. Chose if you want to be able to connect, if you want to be shown online for your friends, if you want to show your server, if you want that other players see that you read their messages, if you want to be able to receive friend requests, if you want to receive chat and group chat notifications and if you want to see a notification if someone of your friends goes online.
        o You can also click on Links in the Chat-GUI
        o Use the arrow keys to scroll through your last sent messages.
        o Online-Statuses:
                ? Choose between “Online”, “Away” and “Offline”
                ? You will be set to “Away” automatically after 10 minutes. You can also change that time in your profile settings. 
        o If you have donated, you name will be displayed with a Green Prefix (if you donated for a default cape) or with a Gold Prefix (if you donated for a custom cape). You will also be able to write with colors in chat, using the ‘&’ char and a Minecraft color code. You will also be able to connect, even if the Server is full.
- Group chats!
        o Create unlimited Group Chats with up to 50 Members!
        o Chat with multiple Friends at once!
        o Group Chat Messages will be saved offline as well
        o If there were new Messages in your Group while you were not online, you will receive them when you are back online again!
        o As an owner, you can manage your group and group members even after you already created your group
                ? Add new Group Members
                ? Remove Members out of your Group
                ? Rename your group
                ? Transfer your ownership
                ? Promote players as administrator
                ? Delete your group
        o Give Group Members the Administrator rank and allow them to manage group members and edit the name.
- Server API recoded!
        o Server API is now fully customizable for plugin developers.
        o Set Scores via a “Key-Value-System”
        o Change the Display Name of the Stat
        o You can create up to 10 different stats
        o Introducing IMAGE SENDING via a Server Plugin!
        o Send Multi-line Titles which are automatically splitted onto a new line and with the “\n” char
        o More information, source code, javadocs and download here: https://github.com/5zig/The-5zig-Mod-API-2.0/
- Added support to various servers
        o play.Ti**a.de
                ? Shows you your current lobby and the stats for the following Game-Modes:
                        ? TSpiele - the time, your kills and your killstreak are being displayed
                        ? 1vs1 - the time, your winstreak, your opponent and all tournament information are being displayed
                        ? DNA - the time and your height are being displayed
                        ? Splun - the time is being displayed
                        ? Brainbow - the time, your kills, your killstreak and your score is being displayed
                        ? 4rena - the time, the winner, your kills, your killstreak and your deaths are being displayed
                        ? InTime (brand new gamemode!) - the time, your kills, your killstreak and  are being displayed
        o GommeHD.net
                ? Shows you your current lobby and the stats for the following Game-Modes:
                        ? Quick Survival Games, Survival Games and Survival Games 64 - your time, your kills, your killstreak and the deathmatch time is being displayed
                        ? Bedwars - your time, your team, your kills, your killstreak, your destroyed beds, if you can respawn and a counter for the next gold respawn is being displayed
                        ? EnderGames - your time, your kills, your killstreak and your kit is being displayed
                        ? PvP - the time, your kills, your killstreak and loot-time are being displayed
        o Mineplex.com (still in work)
                ? Currently only shows your current lobby and gamemode
                ? More features are planned for the future!
        o mc.Hypixel.net
                ? Shows you your current lobby and the stats for the following Game-Modes:
                        ? Quakecraft - the time, your kills and your killstreak is being displayed
                        ? BlitzSG - the time, your kills, your killstreak, your kit, the star-time and deathmatch-time is being displayed
                        ? Paintball - the time, your kills, your killstreak and your team is being displayed
        o mc.PlayMinity.net
                ? Shows you your current lobby and the stats for the following Game-Modes:
                        ? Jumpleague - your time, your checkpoint-count, your fails, your kills and your lives are being displayed
- Added support for 99% of all Minecraft 1.8.4 mods!
        o Using the latest bytecode manipulation technique (powered by ASM), the 5zig Mod is now compatible to nearly any other mod
        o Base Classes of Minecraft are no longer overridden by The 5zig Mod but manipulated in runtime
        o Because of that, Forge Support could been granted as well. The mod will still only be compatible to forge, when forge updates to Minecraft 1.8.4 as well
- Added a Menu-Option to Filter Chat Messages
        o Add Chat Messages to your Filter List and Ignore them ingame
        o Use wildcard characters like “*” or “?” to easy match messages. You can escape those characters with “\”
        o Messages that eg. Spam your chat on specific servers can be easily ignored
        o Messages can be also server specific ignored.
        o Manage all your chat messages in a fancy GUI
- Of course, lots of stuff has been rewritten and optimized, to grant you the most advanced experience ever!
        o Over 95% of previous code has been completely rewritten
        o Rewrote the rendering system
        o Rewrote the Server system, now way more efficient
        o Rewrote Controls, added new Shortcuts & Key bindings. Keybindings can now be viewed in the internal minecraft controls settings
        o Rewrote Languages!
                ? Languages are now managed with a Resource-Bundle System. That means you can create your own language Packs. Simply navigate to your .minecraft/the5zigmod/lang Folder and copy them into it.
                ? Also Server-Side Messages are being translated.
                ? If you want your language to be translated, contact info@5zig.eu
        o Refresh the MCPVP Server List with your F5 key
        o Added a Welcome Screen
        o Added a option to display the direction in text form
        o Added more options:
                ? Added a potion indicator option that displays a colored vignette when having potion effects (green for positive effects, red for negative effects)
                ? Added an option to the current entity count
                ? Added Server Settings for Start Countdown, Invincibility Time, deathmatch-countdown, large killstreaks, etc.
                ? Added seconds to time
                ? Added a display option to the direction
                ? Made direction hide able separately 
- Added a Cape Setting Option
        o Change the visibility of your cape!
        o Upload a new cape from ingame that updates instantly!
        o Select a custom cape or one of the default capes in a GUI.
- Many, many bug fixes!
        o Fixed F 2.5 not displaying a ‘,’
        o Server Ip is now substringed if too long
        o Fixed capes not showing up properly
        o Capes are now compatible to the optifine mod, your optifine cape will be overridden if you have got a 5zig mod cape
        o Fixed Coordinates of the Coordinates Clipboard rendering over TAB List
        o Fixed Large Text (eg in invincibility time) rendering over LAB List
        o Many, many, many other bug fixes
- Added a new MCPVP-Settings-Section in options menu
- Moved ‘Play on McPVP’ to Multiplayer-GUI
- Made the ability to change the formatting of all colors available for everybody
- Improved the Installer!
        o The Installer now checks for its validation and will notify you, if the file may have been changed by someone else
        o Chose now as many mods as you want to install in the Installer!
        o Shows now the current Installation Progress
        o Shows the Minecraft Version the 5zig Mod supports
        o Huge Performance improvements when installing the 5zig Mod with the installer without any mods.
- There are of course many, many other minor new Features that are not listed here. If you have found any major feature, that is not listed here, contact info@5zig.eu 
- Available for Minecraft 1.8.4


Version 2.4.1 (17.02.2015)


* fixed Hardcore Games Stats


Version 2.4 (26.10.2014)


+ Added an automatic Raid Coordinates Calculator 
+ Precise FPS-counter is now toggleable 
+ Added No-Soup HG compatibility 
+ Added a Controls menu 
+ Added a Key to toggle the coords ingame 
* Fixed a bug, where ingame the port is not separated with ‘:’ from the server-ip 
* Changed the Text-block-width in the Save-Coords menu 
* Fixed capes not being visible when having optifine installed 


Version 2.3.2 (26.09.2014)


* fixes MCPVP related bugs 


Version 2.3.1 (21.09.2014)


+ added more precise coordinates via a new slider under display options 
* recoded the 'F' stat 
+ added many languages! 
+ added a way more precise and accurate fps counter, updating every 1/50 second 
+ added a new change brackets option and a new default prefix and suffix design. 
* increased ping interval 
* fixes a bug where the server Ip on mcpvp is not shown correctly 
* recoded some parts 
* fixes a bug where you couldn't change your toggle-mod- and save-coords-key 


Known bugs: 
Due to the Minecraft 1.8 update the mod only recognizes capes from 1.8 clients. Sorry 'bout that. 
Server API still not fixed... Waiting for Bukkit 1.8 update. 
Some translations might be too long, that will be fixed automatically without an update.


Version 2.2 (03.09.2014)


* updated to Minecraft 1.8 
+ added a new, more structured options menu 
+ added a save coordinates gui where you can temporarily save coordinates of a location (coordinates will be displayed on the screen) 
+ added a scale option to scale the mod from 50% to 150% 
+ added a server ping stat 
* changed max gamma(/brightness) to +1000% (in video settings) 
+ added VIP, mvp, pro hub to server list 
* changed the way the authentication with mojang works 
* finalized everything for the 1.8 name change feature 
* bug fixes 
* rewrote some code 
* Performance improvements on Minecraft start 
- removed unused code 


* small bug fixes to the installer 


Known bugs: 
* server api currently doesn't work due to 1.8 changes. It will be fixed when bukkit for 1.8 has been released.


Version 2.1.2 (21.08.2014)


* fixed Armor HUD 
* fixed complete config resetting when not connected to 5zig.eu


Version 2.1.1 (21.08.2014)


* Some bug fixes and performance improvements


Version 2.1 (20.08.2014)


+ added a MCPVP Server List 
+ added changeable location of player stats, server stats, armor HUD and potion effect HUD 
+ added a toggle-mod-key to be able to toggle the mod while ingame 
+ added MCPVP Capture The Flag support 
* the mod now automatically reconnects to 5zig.eu if not connected 
+ added a reset config button 
* HD capes fixed


Version 2.0 (15.08.2014)


Complete recode! More information in the features tab!

客户端比较
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTMxNDIyMjI5Ng==.html

提高以及稳定帧数，游戏必备

支持模组

带有显示药水，盔甲耐久，更多统计信息
